thread.section_title: sellbackyourBook.com Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of sellbackyourBook.com | sellbackyourbook.com
thread.title: Sarah Willage

author: Sarah Willage
title: Sarah Willage
text: After I sent in my books, they said that they wouldn't give me any money at all for one of them because it was in "rough condition", even though it was a book I ended up not using for a class I had taken and had touched a total of two times. When I further inquired about what kind of "rough condition" it was in, I was given a non specific generalized response and all but ignored. Also, they advertise how quick they can give you money for selling your books but it took them over a MONTH to send me the check for the books they did accept. Overall, they had terrible customer service and seemed more like a scam than anything else.
